entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Make online help more prominent #26981
  • Expression bodied catch blocks #26980

Closed

  • Breaking change in response file parsing #26026
  • Failure to publish WASM when project source path contains blank spaces - Post-upgrade VS 2022 to 17.2.4 #26061
  • New NU1701 errors appearing after May 10th release of SDK (6.0.300) #25338

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix exception message when using an argument without a required value. #26994
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1923733 #26992
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #26991
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Enable nullable for the mapper types #26989
    Area-ApiCompat
  • Update the method for removing periods #26977

Merged

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1921748 #26946
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #26971
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Enable nullable for additional ApiCompatibility types #26956
    Area-ApiCompat
  • Add helper for safe access to CLI options when accessing outside of a command invocation #26948
    Area-CLI, cli-ux

Updated

  • add rule for detecting attribute differences #26891
    Area-ApiCompat
  • Update ownership of dotnet watch #26669
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [Blazor] Update SDK to account for the crypto worker file #26966
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Get PublishRelease and PackRelease working in .*proj / Slns #26808
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Use the Implicit SDK RID for RID-Specific Apps by Default + Add PublishSelfContained #26143
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Trim response file lines to prevent forwarding along whitespace-only tokens #26627
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Migrate dotnet new Cli, dotnet-new3, *.IntegrationTests, *.UnitTests, template_feed to SDK #26521
    Area-Templates
